title: Lp gain and loss is broke?
body: So in diamond right now, Me ( and many other I've talked to ) are gaining around 10 - 15 lp per win whilst losing between 20 - 30 per loss. I checked my mmr on opgg and its average but I'm just wondering if anyone else is getting this?  Just seems a little unfair is all.

replies.body: I though that was the norm for people in high elo?
That's the norm for people that don't belong in that elo, only Diamond 1 is high elo btw.
